content: Yes, Decca Records has a rich history of jazz recordings and is home to many great jazz musicians. Some notable jazz musicians who have recorded under Decca Records include Louis Armstrong, Billie Holiday, Ella Fitzgerald, and Count Basie. Decca has also released albums by contemporary jazz artists such as Gregory Porter, Melody Gardot, and Jamie Cullum. So, if you're a fan of jazz, you may want to explore Decca's jazz catalog, which contains many classic recordings as well as newer releases.
